Headline: No Trains Between Harlem (O'Hare Branch) and Addison
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem (O'Hare Branch) and Addison due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Jefferson Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem (O'Hare Branch) and Addison due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Jefferson Park.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and Harlem (O'Hare Branch), and,
  • between Addison and Forest Park, only.

Shuttle buses are available from Harlem (O'Hare Branch) to Addison to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #56 Milwaukee buses.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Forest Park
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near the area of Forest Park due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near the area of Forest Park due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
